title: 83/53/EEC: Commission Decision of 24 January 1983 amending Decision 74/441/EEC relating to the setting up of a Joint Committee on Social Problems in Sea Fishing
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 24 January 1983
amending Decision 74/441/EEC relating to the setting up of a Joint Committee on Social Problems in Sea Fishing
(83/53/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Decision 74/441/EEC is hereby amended as follows:
1. Article 4 is replaced by the following:
'Article 4
1. The Committee shall consist of 44 members.
2. Seats shall be attributed as follows:
(a) to representatives of employers: 22;
(b) to representatives of employees: 22.
3. The members of the Committee shall be appointed by the Commission, 42 of them on proposals from the following associations of employers in sea fishing and associations of fishermen:
- Employers' associations (21 members):
- Association of National Organizations of Fishing Enterprises in the European Economic Community (Europeche),
- Specialized Committee for Fishing Cooperatives in the European Economic Community (Cogeca).
- Employees' associations (21 members):
- The Committee of Transport Unions in the European Community (ITF).'
2. The following paragraph 4 is added to Article 13:
'4. The Commission may, after consulting the Committee, invite organizations other than those referred to in Article 4 (3) to participate in the Committee's work as observers.'
This Decision shall take effect on 24 January 1983.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 January 1983.
For the Commission
Ivor RICHARD
Member of the Commission
